title: Which Slipknot song has the darkest lyrics? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’d probably say Everything Ends is probably the darkest song lyrically because it specifically is about Corey’s attempted suicide after breaking up with his then girlfriend. He talks about cutting himself and realizing how messed up he is in that moment. With lines from “my eyes turn from blue to grey” and “I am only conditioned to die”, how can it not be the darkest song?
